contexts.context: ...and he discovered that everything went beautifully, as <mark>soon</mark> as he let his name become chromatic. After...
...bravely and confidently with a, b, h, c. As <mark>soon</mark> as one dechromatises a, b, h, c the result...
...will burst forth in a cry of rejoicing as <mark>soon</mark> as we courageously say »Yea« to it....
